name: graphql-args
description: A lib that parses the resolver ast, to return the requested object fields and provided params, at any nested level.
author: Stephan Meijer <stephan@meijer.ws>

scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && microbundle -i src/index.js -o dist/index.js --no-pkg-main -f umd --target node
scripts.watch: rimraf ./dist && microbundle -i src/index.js -o dist/index.js --no-pkg-main -f umd --sourcemap true --compress false --target node --watch --raw
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch -m 'release: cut the %s release'
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor -m 'release: cut the %s release'
scripts.bump:major: npm version major -m 'release: cut the %s release'
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
